item.title: Monkeys are on the loose in St. Louis, and AI-generated jokes are just slowing down animal control’s primate chase
item.description: “It's been a lot in regard to AI and what's genuine and what's not,” city health spokesperson Willie Springer. “People are just having fun.”

item.title: ‘Apple Intelligence,’ powered by Gemini, marks a ‘major validation moment for Google,’ top tech analyst says
item.description: The deal allowing Apple to tap into Google's AI technology was disclosed Monday in a joint statement from the Silicon Valley powerhouses.

item.title: Allegiant Air to acquire Sun Country Airlines for $1.5 billion
item.description: The airlines said travelers shouldn’t expect any immediate changes and can continue booking and flying with either carrier as they normally do.

item.title: Grok blocked in Malaysia and Indonesia as sexual deepfake scandal builds
item.description: Scrutiny of Grok is growing, including in the EU, India, France and the UK, which said Monday it was moving to criminalize “nudification apps.”

item.title: Paramount fires back at Warner Bros. bid, launching proxy fight for board seats at annual meeting
item.description: Paramount has also filed a lawsuit asking Warner Bros. Discovery to give more information about its merger agreement with Netflix.
